useNodejsImportProtocol.description:
Description

Enforces using thenode:protocol for Node.js builtin modules.
The rule marks traditional imports likeimport fs from "fs";as invalid,
suggesting the formatimport fs from "node:fs";instead.
The rule also isn’t triggered if there are dependencies declared in thepackage.jsonthat match
the name of a built-in Node.js module.
CautionThe rule doesn’t support dependencies installed inside a monorepo.
useNodejsImportProtocol.option: This rule has no specific options.
